data.persona: I am an outgoing and sociable person. I like to travel around the world and trade with different communities. I like adventure and like weird obejects.
data.description:
You are in the Large Galleon.
The deck of this rather large ship is strong and freshly swapped with tar. Its mast reaches far into the sky like gleaming pillar of hope and freedom. Its sturdy ship made for long voyages with thick planks and strong rails.
There's a rusty anchor, a deck, a mast, and a tar here.
The captain is here.

You are carrying a coin, and wearing a Pocket watch.

data.short_motivation: I need to ready my ship
data.mid_motivation: I am porting out tonight and have many errands to run first
data.long_motivation: I need to travel across the sea to see my weird objects
